DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study explore efficacy phone-based weight loss program stress management technique integrate throughout ( Weight Talk-Mindfulness ) . The program target employee certain company meet cut-off score measure stress-related eating . The control group receive standard phone-based program additional stress management information ( Weight Talk-Standard ) . - Hypothesis 1 : Participants Weight Talk-Mindfulness ( WT-M ; n=50 ) experience decrease stress-related & emotion-related eating compare Weight Talk-Standard ( WT-S ; n=25 ) group . - Hypothesis 2 : The WT-M group lose weight compare WT-S control group . - Hypothesis 3 : Participants WT-M experience decrease perceived stress , increase eat self-efficacy , increase acceptance weight-related thought & feeling increase mindfulness compare WT-S control arm . - Hypothesis 4 : Participants WT-M equally satisfy weight loss program WT-S .
DOC.brief_title: Mind/Body Stress Management Improve Outcomes Workplace Weight Loss Programs
DOC.criteria: Be enrol Weight Talk program , inclusion criterion : Employment one employer contract Weight Talk service Being 18 year age Speak read English Have start BMI 25 35 . Score 5 high 8item Internal Disinhibition subscale Eating Inventory . Have regular access email internet . Willingness ability complete study intervention procedure , include complete assessment , engage moderate physical activity ( e.g. , walking , swim ) use electronic scale least per week . Type 2 Diabetes ( Type 1 exclusion Weight Talk program ) . Past diagnosis anorexia nervosa bulimia nervosa . Weight Talk program exclusion criterion include : Pregnancy Bariatric surgery within past 12 month plan next 6 month Undergoing dialysis Have Type 1 Diabetes diagnosis Women pregnant eligible program , contraception require low risk study Currently use plan start use pharmaceutical weight loss drug
